how to solve the problem listed below?

fail to compile the shell project with error "Could not find 'Shell.App' specified for Main method" after I have changed the namespace of the shell project.

detail steps:

1. create a Prism WPF 4.0 Shell project. 

2. select Bootstrapper.cs file, select "Shell" at the line: namespace Shell.

3. update the name space from "Shell" to "Test.Shell" by right click--refactor-rename, (default click all the button on the pop up windows.)

4. check other classes. find the namespaces are updated accordingly. 

5. rebuild all

6. error occurs...
